= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * this is a plugin that broadcasts info about  level

  function OnPluginBroadcast (msg, id, name, text)

      -- get the info
      loadstring( pvar )()

  end

= Installation ==
 * Required 
  * [pluginhelper] and its dependencies
  * [broadcast_state]
 * see the [Download] Page, and copy the file into worlds\plugins\Aardwolf

= Troubleshooting =
 * run the command "blevel set tdebug true" to enable debugging
